subject: RE: Order #SSN4124, how did it go?
description_text:
Hi. Can someone please contact me about the missing parts I have already been in contact about. Thus was supposed to be my sons Xmas present and we can't build it. Please.  Thank you



Sent from my Galaxy



-------- Original message --------
From: SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io>
Date: 29/12/2025 12:42 (GMT+00:00)
To: tammyewilliams@hotmail.co.uk
Subject: Order #SSN4124, how did it go?

Hello Tammy, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only takes a few seconds. ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌
